name: Fraud Prevention For Woocommerce
author: theDotstore

sections.description:
Do you want to stop fraudulent transactions on your WooCommerce store?

👉 Fraud Prevention Plugin allows WooCommerce to refuse orders from specific visitors, based on customizable blacklisting criteria. You can block fraud customers by Email, IP Address, State, and Zipcode. It will help your store grow its business, with the power of valid transactions

👉 Block your unwanted spammy customers who come to your site and just download free items with fake email addresses.

When a user will try to place an order or register using one of the blacklisted IP addresses, State, and Zipcode.checkout or account will be interrupted and the user will be notified of the reason why the operation was blocked.

Key Benefits of blocking multiple users

🔑 It decreases refund ratio of WooCommerce store
🔑 Save your time to every single fraudulent transaction.
🔑 Secure your WooCommerce store by fake orders

Plugin : VIEW LIVE DEMO

Free plugin: Need Technical Help? – Click here
Pro Plugin: PRE-SALE Questions – Click here or Review Help Document

💁 Key features of Fraud Prevention Plugin – Free Version

  • Block fraud customer on User Registration
  • Block fraud customer on checkouts
  • View Blacklisted user details
  • View Reports on the dashboard
  • Block fraud customer by Multiple IP addresses
  • Block fraud customer by the Multiple States
  • Block fraud customer by the Multiple Zipcode
  • Set Specific Custom Message for All blacklisted user
  • Block fraud customer by suspicious email addresses

sections.installation:
• Download the plugin
  • Upload the folder “woo-blocker-lite-prevent-fake-orders-and-blacklist-fraud-customers” to wp-content/plugins (or upload a zip through the WordPress admin)
  • Activate and enjoy!
sections.faq:
Q. How do I block fraud customers on checkout page?

Yes, you have to activate woocommerce blocker plugin and enable checkout page condition in the plugin and you can block specific user by email, IP address, state and zipcode

Q. How do I block fraud customers on registration pages?

Yes, you have to activate woocommerce blocker plugin and enable registration page condition in the plugin and you can block specific user by email, IP address, state and zipcode

Q. Can I block fraud customers by IP address?

Yes, you have to activate woocommerce blocker plugin and enable registration page/ checkout page condition in the plugin and you can block IP address. You can add multiple IP address in the plugin.

Q. Can i block fraud customers by state, zip code, domain, IP address and email address?

Yes, you have to activate woocommerce blocker plugin and enable registration page/ checkout page condition in the plugin and you can block IP address. You can add multiple IP address in the plugin.

Q. Can i set custom error message for blocked listed user?

Yes, you have to activate woocommerce blocker plugin and enable registration page/ checkout page condition in the plugin and you can block IP address. You can add multiple IP address in the plugin. Plugin will give option to add custom message as per your condition like block by email, IP address, state and zipcode.

Q. Can I block external blacklist of github with woocommerce blocker plugin?

Yes, you have to activate woocommerce blocker plugin and enable external blacklist of github. There is a list of disposable/temporary email domains in Github. You can use this list too along with your own blacklist.

Q. Can I see list of blocked users/ top blocked user and how many times he has attempted for placing an order in the website.

Yes, you have to activate woocommerce blocker plugin. Plugin provides list of blocked users email address and how many attempt by specific user.
sections.changelog:
2.1.8

  • [Bug Fix] Minor fixes related to domain blocking
  • [Enhancement] Compatible with WooCommerce 8.6.x
  • [Enhancement] Compatible with WordPress 6.4.x

2.1.7

  • [Bug Fix] Fixed the plugin activation issue during the wizard setup.
  • [Enhancement] Compatible with PHP 8.2
  • [Enhancement] Compatible with WooCommerce 8.4.x
  • [Enhancement] Compatible with WordPress 6.4.x

2.1.6

  • [Bug Fix] Fixed error causing fraud risk column-related issues
  • [Bug Fix] Minor fixes related to the Cross Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability
  • [Enhancement] Compatible with WooCommerce 8.0.x
  • [Enhancement] Compatible with WordPress 6.3.x

2.1.5

  • [New] Added option to auto block users by Subdomains.
  • [Bug fix] Minor fixes related to the php warning of json_decode.
  • [Enhancement] Plugin compatibility with WooCommerce High-Performance Order Storage (HPOS)
  • [Enhancement] Plugin UI enhancement
  • [Enhancement] Introduced plugin setup wizard
  • [Enhancement] Compatible with PHP8.
  • [Enhancement] Compatible with WooCommerce 8.0.x
  • [Enhancement] Compatible with WordPress 6.3.x

  • [Enhancement] Compatible with PHP8.
  • [Enhancement] Compatible with WooCommerce 7.2.x
  • [Enhancement] Compatible with WordPress 6.1.x

sections.reviews:
Conflicts with other important plugins

By poletaew on November 3, 2023

This plugin conflicts with other important plugins. So I won't use it anymore.

Can't Add Multiple Blacklist Emails Easily

By adz (ratsbag) on November 7, 2022

Tried to import our black list of email addresses (comma separated as it suggests) and it only will save the first email and ignore the rest.

Works great

By George (onceageorge) on December 4, 2021

Just add the e-mail, message and it blocks them. Recommend.

Makes the job

By Li-An on September 28, 2021

I went to this plugin to block the quite usual @abbuzz.com spammer on WooCommerce but as domain blocking is allowed only in premium version, the plugin is useless for me. By chance, there is a dedicated plugin for this problem. UPDATE: as the plugin gives the opportunity to block domains, I consider it’s a quite good tool to protect your shop against bots.

So Easy, So Good. A must have

By bladeedge on November 12, 2020

Some Bods started attacking my three web sites. Used this free version with a hope to cure it. No worries there. Couldn't believe how many attacks it had prevented. It's the free version, so limited to prevention choices. But, it's a must have. 5 stars from me

Cannot globally block @domain.com, need specific email address

By catdec on November 2, 2020

Plugin seems great but I would put 5 stars only if possible to block @domain.com and not only specific addresses.

everything ok

By alsangalli on September 25, 2020

easy and simply, it works well

Worked a charm!

By vikkiclayton on August 16, 2020

Did exactly what it said and super simple. Thanks!

useful

By apagoa on June 22, 2020

It does what it says, thank you to developer for creating this plugin.

It works

By razide on June 8, 2020

It does what it says, and the support is fast, even for the free plugin.
